text: Margaret A. Farrow (November 28, 1934 â€“ March 8, 2022) was an American Republican politician. She was the 42nd Lieutenant Governor of Wisconsin from 2001 until 2003. She was the first woman to hold the office. Farrow was also a member of the Wisconsin State Assembly from 1986 until 1989 and Wisconsin State Senate from 1989 until 1991. Farrow was born in Kenosha, Wisconsin. Farrow died on March 8, 2022 in Pewaukee, Wisconsin at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Kenosha, Wisconsin Category:Lieutenant Governors of Wisconsin
title: Margaret Farrow
